title: Executive Order 8956-Partial Revocation of Executive Order No. 4411 of April 1, 1926, Withdrawing Public Lands for Classification and in Aid of Legislation
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910, c. 421, 36 Stat. 847, Executive Order No. 4411 of April 1, 1926, temporarily withdrawing certain public lands in Montana for classification and in aid of legislation, is hereby revoked so far as it affects the following-described land:
T. 15 N., R. 6 W., sec. 7, NW¼SE¼, 40 acres.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 8956-Partial Revocation of Executive Order No. 4411 of April 1, 1926, Withdrawing Public Lands for Classification and in Aid of Legislation Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/368309
